channel.title: ping not working in workstation13 out of the box
channel.description:
Clean installation of gateway+workstation 13 nslookup and browser works but ping doesn't work.
Is it ok?
see my terminal output -
user@host:~$ nslookup check.torproject.org Server: 10.137.2.1 Address: 10.137.2.1#53
Non-authoritative answer: Name: check.torproject.org Address: 138.201.14.212
user@host:~$ ping 8.8.8.8 PING 8.8.8.8 (8.8.8.8) 56(84) bytes of data. ^C --- 8.8.8.8 ping statistics --- 14 packets transmitted, 0 received, 100% packet loss, time 13000ms

item.title: ping not working in workstation13 out of the box
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
ping requires UDP which is not supported by Tor. More info on Tor UDP:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor#UDP

Read full topic
item.source: ping not working in workstation13 out of the box

item.title: ping not working in workstation13 out of the box
item.dc:creator: nova
item.description:
Clean installation of gateway+workstation 13
nslookup and browser works but ping doesn’t work.

Is it ok?

see my terminal output -

user@host:~$ nslookup check.torproject.org
Server: 10.137.2.1
Address: 10.137.2.1#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name: check.torproject.org
Address: 138.201.14.212

user@host:~$ ping 8.8.8.8
PING 8.8.8.8 (8.8.8.8) 56(84) bytes of data.
^C
— 8.8.8.8 ping statistics —
14 packets transmitted, 0 received, 100% packet loss, time 13000ms

Read full topic
